00001 /*===========================================================================
00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                           MtkSetRegionByUlcLrc                            =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================

00010 
00011             Copyright 2005, California Institute of Technology.
00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 #include "MisrSetRegion.h"
00018 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00021 #include "MisrOrbitPath.h"
00022 
00037 MTKt_status MtkSetRegionByUlcLrc(
00038   double ulc_lat_dd, 
00039   double ulc_lon_dd, 
00040   double lrc_lat_dd, 
00041   double lrc_lon_dd, 
00042   MTKt_Region *region  )
00043 {
00044   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00045   MTKt_Region rgn;      /* Region structure */
00046   double lat_extent_dd;     /* Latitude extent */
00047   double lon_extent_dd;     /* Longitude extent */
00048   double meters_per_deg;        /* Meters per degree at equator */
00049 
00050   if (region == NULL)
00051     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00052 
00053   /* Check latitude bounds */
00054   if (ulc_lat_dd > 90.0 || ulc_lat_dd < -90.0)
00055     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00056   if (lrc_lat_dd > 90.0 || lrc_lat_dd < -90.0)
00057     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00058   if (ulc_lat_dd < lrc_lat_dd)
00059     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00060 
00061   /* Check longitude bounds */
00062   if (ulc_lon_dd > 180.0 || ulc_lon_dd < -180.0)
00063     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00064   if (lrc_lon_dd > 180.0 || lrc_lon_dd < -180.0)
00065     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00066 
00067   /* Check for date line crossing */
00068   lat_extent_dd = ulc_lat_dd - lrc_lat_dd;
00069   rgn.geo.ctr.lat = ulc_lat_dd - lat_extent_dd / 2.0;
00070   if (ulc_lon_dd > lrc_lon_dd) {
00071     lon_extent_dd = 360 + lrc_lon_dd - ulc_lon_dd;  /* Date line crossed */
00072   } else {
00073     lon_extent_dd = lrc_lon_dd - ulc_lon_dd;
00074   }
00075   rgn.geo.ctr.lon = ulc_lon_dd + lon_extent_dd / 2.0;
00076 
00077   if (lat_extent_dd <= 0.0) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00078   if (lon_extent_dd <= 0.0) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00079 
00080   /* Half of the over all extent to measure from center */
00081   meters_per_deg = 111319.54315;
00082   rgn.hextent.xlat = lat_extent_dd * meters_per_deg / 2.0;
00083   rgn.hextent.ylon = lon_extent_dd * meters_per_deg / 2.0;
00084 
00085   *region = rgn;
00086 
00087   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00088 
00089 ERROR_HANDLE:
00090   return status_code;
00091 }
